about_the_game:
Plot

As a teenager, the hero's father tried to expose corruption at a local factory but was falsely accused and arrested. His mother was subjected to constant surveillance by the authorities. Witnessing how technology became a tool of oppression, the young man decided to fight for justice. He started by disabling cameras in his neighborhood, then learned to hack drones and neutralize police patrols. Donning a mask and armed with simple tools, he became a defender of freedom and justice in his city.

Surveillance Systems:

  • Patrol Officers: They follow set routes and pursue the player if the attention meter rises, leading to arrest and mission failure.
  • Police Motorcycles and Cars: These patrol the streets and can hinder the player's escape, leading to imprisonment if caught.
  • Drones: Flying units that transmit the player's coordinates to the police, slow them down, and increase the attention meter.
  • Robotic Dogs: Ground units that stun the player with electric charges and send them to prison upon capture.
  • Cameras: Citywide surveillance that raises the attention meter if the player stays in view too long.
  • Robot and Drone Control Towers: Disabling these towers deactivates nearby drones and robots, offering a chance to avoid pursuit.

Setting

The game takes place in a futuristic urban landscape, bathed in neon lights and covered in graffiti. High-tech advancements are a core part of life, but the residents are weary of constant surveillance.

name: Kick Out

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2400s @ 2.5 GHz, AMD FX 6120 @ 3.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 with 2 GB VRAM or AMD Radeon HD 7870, with 2 GB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Technologies tore your family apart. Now you’ll tear them down. Put on the mask and unleash true anarchy in this city.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese
